sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_211b37bf476521107607dffe046d43dc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AzureADUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Util methods related to Azure AD actions</description><name>AzureADUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureADUtil = Class.create();
AzureADUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    validateInputs: function() {},


    marshallInputs: function(inputs, outputs) {
        for (var val in inputs)
            if (!gs.nil(inputs[val]) && inputs.hasOwnProperty(val))
                outputs[val] = this.trimInput(inputs[val]).replace(/'/g, "''").replace(/"/g, "\\\"").replace(/,/g, "%2C").replace(/&/g, "%26").replace(/#/g, "%23").replace(/:/g, "%3A").replace(/\?/g, "%3F").replace(/\//g, "%2F").replace(/=/g, "%3D").replace(/\+/g, "%2B");
        return outputs;

    },
    cleanseSingleInput: function(input) {
        return encodeURI(this.trimInput(input)).replace(/'/g, "''").replace(/"/g, "\\\"").replace(/,/g, "%2C").replace(/&/g, "%26").replace(/#/g, "%23").replace(/:/g, "%3A").replace(/\?/g, "%3F").replace(/\//g, "%2F").replace(/=/g, "%3D").replace(/\+/g, "%2B");
    },
    encodeInput: function(input) {
        input = this.trimInput(input).replace(/'/g, "%27").replace(/"/g, "%22").replace(/,/g, "%2C").replace(/&/g, "%26").replace(/#/g, "%23").replace(/:/g, "%3A").replace(/\?/g, "%3F").replace(/\//g, "%2F").replace(/=/g, "%3D").replace(/\+/g, "%2B");
        return input;
    },
    trimInput: function(input) {
        return input.toString().trim();
    },
    cleanseInput: function(inputs, outputs) {
        for (var val in inputs)
            if (inputs.hasOwnProperty(val))
                outputs[val] = this.cleanseSingleInput(inputs[val]);
        return outputs;
    },
    includeCustomProp: function(input, custom) {
        var obj = new global.JSON().decode(custom);
        for (var i in obj) {
            if (typeof(input[i]) === undefined)
                input[i] = obj[i];
        }
        return input;
    },
    extractGroupInfo: function(resultObj, respObj, entity) {
        respObj.groups = "";
        respObj.numberOfGroupsFound = 0;
        var grpArray = entity.value;
        if (grpArray && grpArray.length > 0) {
            var groups = grpArray.filter(function(o) {
                return o["@odata.type"] == "#microsoft.graph.group"
            });
            var groupsList = groups.map(function(o) {
                return {
                    'id': o.id,
                    'name': o.displayName
                }
            });
            respObj.groups = new global.JSON().encode(groupsList);
            respObj.numberOfGroupsFound = groups.length;
        }
        return respObj;
    },
    userHelper: function(inputs) {
        const id_length = 36;
        if (inputs.user_id && inputs.user_id.trim() == "")
            this.throwHandler(Error, "UserId should not be empty");

        if (inputs.user_id && inputs.user_id.length != id_length && inputs.user_id.indexOf("@") == -1)
            this.throwHandler(Error, "Invalid User ID");

        if (inputs.new_password && inputs.new_password.trim() == "")
            this.throwHandler(Error, "Password should not be empty");
    },

    //method to get the Status and no of Entities
    //allowed entity values : "user" or "group"
    getStatusMessageForLookups: function(resultObj, respObj, entity) {
        if (resultObj.value.length > 0) {
            respObj.id = resultObj.value[0].id;

            if (resultObj.value.length == 1)
                respObj.status = entity.concat(" Found");
            else
                respObj.status = "Multiple ".concat(entity + "s Found");
        } else
            respObj.status = entity.concat(" Not Found");

        return respObj;

    },
    throwHandler: function(ErrorType, ErrorMessage) {
        throw new ErrorType(ErrorMessage);
    },
    isUserInGroupHelper: function(inputs) {
        if (!inputs.UserName || inputs.UserName.trim() == "")
            this.throwHandler(Error, "User ID should not be empty");

        if (!inputs.GroupName || inputs.GroupName.trim() == "")
            this.throwHandler(Error, "Group ID should not be empty");
    },
    createUserTrimInput: function(inputs) {
        for (var val in inputs)
            if (!gs.nil(inputs[val]) && inputs.hasOwnProperty(val))
                inputs[val] = this.cleanseSingleInput(inputs[val]).replace(/%20/g, " ");
        return inputs;
    },
    generateRandomPassword: function(len) {
        var length = len ? len : 10, op, value;
        var string = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"; //to upper
        var numeric = "0123456789";
        var punctuation = "@#$%^&*-_!+=[]{}|:',.?/`~();<>";
        var password = "";
        var character = "";
        var crunch = true;
        while (password.length < length) {
            entity1 = Math.ceil(string.length * Math.random() * Math.random());
            entity2 = Math.ceil(numeric.length * Math.random() * Math.random());
            entity3 = Math.ceil(punctuation.length * Math.random() * Math.random());
            hold = string.charAt(entity1);
            hold = password.length % 2 == 0 ? hold.toUpperCase() : hold;
            character += hold;
            character += numeric.charAt(entity2);
            character += punctuation.charAt(entity3);
            password = character;
        }
        password = password
            .split("")
            .sort(function() {
                return 0.5 - Math.random();
            })
            .join("");
		
		op = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFCryptoOperation("sn_azure_ad_spoke.glide_encrypter", "symmetric_wrapping").withAlgorithm("AES");
		password = password.substr(0, len);
        value = gs.base64Encode(password);
        return op.doOperation(value);
    },
     
     trimInputs: function(inputs) {
        for (var key in inputs) {
            if (typeof inputs[key] == 'string')
                inputs[key] = inputs[key].trim();
        }
        return inputs;
    },

    validateMandatoryInputs: function(mandatoryInputs) {
        var emptyInputs = "",
            emptyInputsCount = 0;
        mandatoryInputs.forEach(function(mandatoryInput) {
            if (mandatoryInput.type === 'string') {
                if (gs.nil(mandatoryInput.value)) {
                    if (emptyInputsCount == 0)
                        emptyInputs += mandatoryInput.input_label;
                    else
                        emptyInputs += ", " + mandatoryInput.input_label;
                    emptyInputsCount++;
                }
            }
        });
        if (emptyInputsCount > 0) {
            throw new Error("Following mandatory input(s) are not provided : " + emptyInputs);
        }
    },
     
    type: 'AzureADUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-20 11:34:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>211b37bf476521107607dffe046d43dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureADUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_211b37bf476521107607dffe046d43dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-20 11:34:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
publictruefalsebf2f2fec73f70300b61e66476bf6a774<p id = "short_desc"> Creates an office 365 group that can be shared with other members in the group.</p><p><b>Inputs</b> :</p> <ul id = "inputs"><li><b>Display Name</b> - Name to display in the address book for the group.</li><li><b>Enable Distribution List</b> - New distribution list will be created with the name provided in the group email alias.</li><li><b>Group Email Alias</b> - Group email address or distribution list associated with the group.</li><li><b>Description</b> - Provide additional information about the group in azure ad.</li><li><b>Visibility</b> - Visibility of the created group or its contents. By default set to public.</li><li><b>Owners</b> - List of user ID to be associated as owners of the created group.</li><li><b>Members</b> - List of user ID to be associated as members of the created group.</li><p></p></ul> <p><b>Outputs</b> : </p><ul id ='outputs'><li><b>Group ID</b> - Unique ID of the Group.</li><li><b>Status</b> - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Azure AD, Status is set to “Error”.</li><li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li></ul><p></p><p><b>Error Messages</b> : </p><ul id = 'error_messages'><li>Group Email Alias Already Exists.</li><li>Invalid Name.</li><li>Unauthorized.</li><li>Insufficient Permissions. Check OAuth Token and scope permission.</li><li>Forbidden Request. Check OAuth Token and scope permission.</li><li>Invalid Connection.</li><li>Unknown Error.</li></ul><p></p><p>To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Azure AD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Azure AD Connection & Credential alias. <a target='_blank' href='http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias'>Learn More</a></p> <p></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target='_blank' href='https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information'>Read More</a>.</p><!-- 11:16:05global/c60733bb476521107607dffe046d43bb1admin2023-03-20 11:16:27publicfalsebf2f2fec73f70300b61e66476bf6a774<p id = "short_desc"> Creates an office 365 group that can be shared with other members in the group.</p><p><b>Inputs</b> :</p> <ul id = "inputs"><li><b>Display Name</b> - Name to display in the address book for the group.</li><li><b>Enable Distribution List</b> - New distribution list will be created with the name provided in the group email alias.</li><li><b>Group Email Alias</b> - Group email address or distribution list associated with the group.</li><li><b>Description</b> - Provide additional information about the group in azure ad.</li><li><b>Visibility</b> - Visibility of the created group or its contents. By default set to public.</li><li><b>Owners</b> - List of user ID to be associated as owners of the created group.</li><li><b>Members</b> - List of user ID to be associated as members of the created group.</li><p></p></ul> <p><b>Outputs</b> : </p><ul id ='outputs'><li><b>Group ID</b> - Unique ID of the Group.</li><li><b>Status</b> - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Azure AD, Status is set to “Error”.</li><li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li></ul><p></p><p><b>Error Messages</b> : </p><ul id = 'error_messages'><li>Group Email Alias Already Exists.</li><li>Invalid Name.</li><li>Unauthorized.</li><li>Insufficient Permissions. Check OAuth Token and scope permission.</li><li>Forbidden Request. Check OAuth Token and scope permission.</li><li>Invalid Connection.</li><li>Unknown Error.</li></ul><p></p><p>To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Azure AD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Azure AD Connection & Credential alias. <a target='_blank' href='http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias'>Learn More</a></p> <p></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target='_blank' href='https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information'>Read More</a>.</p><!-- <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AzureADErrorHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>All the Error handling methods related to Azure AD actions</description><name>AzureADErrorHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureADErrorHandler = Class.create();
AzureADErrorHandler.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    setNoPropertiesError: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        if (inputObj.queryParamsStatus) {
            respObj.status = 'Error';
            respObj.errorMessage = inputObj.queryParamsStatus;
        }
        return respObj;
    }, 

    genericErrorHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj.errorMessage = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : "UnKnown Error";
        if (inputObj.queryParamsStatus) {
            respObj.status = 'Error';
            respObj.errorMessage = inputObj.queryParamsStatus;
        }


        if (inputObj.status == 401) {
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unauthorized");
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.code == "InvalidAuthenticationToken") {
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Insufficient Permissions. Please Check Oauth Token and scope permission.");
            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 403)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Forbidden Request. Please Check Oauth Token and scope permission.");
        if (inputObj.status == 500)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Azure Not Reachable.");
        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {

                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Invalid version") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Connection URL");
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("The request URI is not valid") != -1 && responseBody.error.message.indexOf("users") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        }
        return respObj;
    },

    genericErrorHandler2: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj.errorMessage = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : "UnKnown Error";
        if (inputObj.queryParamsStatus) {
            respObj.status = 'Error';
            respObj.errorMessage = inputObj.queryParamsStatus;
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 500)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Azure Not Reachable.");
        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Invalid version") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Connection URL");
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("The request URI is not valid") != -1 && responseBody.error.message.indexOf("users") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 401) {
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unauthorized");
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.code == "InvalidAuthenticationToken") {
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Insufficient Permissions.Check if the correct scopes are defined as part of OAuth Configuration");
            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 403)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Forbidden Request.The access token is expired or may not be available");
		
		if (inputObj.status == 408 || inputObj.status == 429 || inputObj.status == 503)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Transient Error");
		
        return respObj;
    },

    deleteUserHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {

        var errorCode;
        if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.code)
            errorCode = responseBody.error.code;
        else
            errorCode = 'Bad_Code';

        if (errorCode == 'Request_ResourceNotFound')
            respObj.errorMessage = "User with ID '".concat(inputObj.userId).concat("' doesn't exist in the system");
        else if (errorCode == 'Bad_Code')
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Something went wrong. Try after sometime");
        else
            respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);

        return respObj;

    },

    licenseHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not correspond to a valid company License") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = inputObj.SkuID.concat(" is not valid SKU ID");

                else if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("User does not have a corresponding license") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("User ID is not associated with SKU ID");
                else if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Cannot convert a primitive value to the expected type") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = inputObj.SkuID.concat(" is not valid SKU ID");
                else if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Please fix the request") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
                else if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not have any available licenses") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("SKU provided does not have any available licenses");

            }



        }
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not exist or one of its queried") != -1 && responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Resource") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }

        }

        if (inputObj.status == 405) {

            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;

                if (msg.indexOf("Specified HTTP method is not allowed for the request target") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("User ID and SKU ID cannot be empty");
            }
        }

        return respObj;
    },

    Office365GroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {

        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Another object with the same value for property mailNickname already exists") != -1) {
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Group Email Alias Already Exists");
                }
                if ((responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Invalid value specified for property") != -1) || (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("A value is required for property") != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Group Email Alias or Group Display Name is invalid");

            }

        }

        return respObj;
    },

    addUserToGroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        var msg = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : null;
        if (inputObj.status == 400 && msg) {
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Member Already Exists in group");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties: 'owners'.") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Provided user is already an owner of the Group");
            if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userId.trim()) != -1))
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("of type 'Group' is invalid for the 'owners' reference") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'directoryObjects' refers to a collection") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'groups' refers to a collection") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("User is already added to the Group");

            for (var val in inputObj) {
                if (inputObj.hasOwnProperty(val) && inputObj[val] != undefined) {
                    if (!inputObj.groupId.toString().trim().length)
                        respObj.errorMessage = 'Invalid Group ID';
                    else if (!inputObj.userId.toString().trim().length)
                        respObj.errorMessage = 'Invalid User ID';

                }
            }

        }
        if (inputObj.status == 404 && msg) {
            if ((msg.indexOf("does not exist") != -1))
                if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userId.trim()) != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
        }
        if (respObj.errorMessage) {
            respObj.ErrorMessage = respObj.errorMessage;
            delete respObj.errorMessage
        }
        return respObj;
    },

    removeOwnerFromGroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.removeUserFromGroupHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (respObj.ErrorMessage.indexOf('User does not exist in the group') != -1)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("User is not an owner of the group");
    },

    removeUserFromGroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj.errorMessage = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : "UnKnown Error";
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;
                var regexp = new RegExp(/Resource '([a-zA-Z0-9-]+)' does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present/);

                if (regexp.test(responseBody.error.message)) {
                    if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.toString().trim()) != -1)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("User does not exist in the group");
                    if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userId.toString().trim()) != -1)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");

                }

            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 405) {

            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;
                if (msg.indexOf("Uri is invalid for a DELETE operation") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");

            }
        }

        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
                if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userId.trim()) != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");

                if (msg.indexOf("Unsupported referenced-object resource identifier for link property") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'owners' refers to a collection") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'groups' refers to a collection") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");

                if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. $ref cannot be applied to the segment") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("Unsupported directory object class 'Group' in resource identifier for reference 'owners'") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("The group must have at least one owner, hence this owner cannot be removed") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The group must have at least one owner, hence this owner cannot be removed");

                if (msg.indexOf("The group must have at least one owner, hence this owner cannot be removed.") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The group must have at least one owner, hence this owner cannot be removed");
            }
        }
        if (respObj.errorMessage) {
            respObj.ErrorMessage = respObj.errorMessage;
            delete respObj.errorMessage;
        }


        return respObj;
    },


    commonUserErrorHandler: function(inputObj, respObj) {

        var respBody = new global.JSON().decode(inputObj['response']);

        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, respBody);

        if (inputObj.status == 405) {

            if (respBody.error && respBody.error.message) {
                var msg = respBody.error.message;

                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
                if (msg.indexOf("Specified HTTP method is not allowed for the request target") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            var error;

            if (respBody.error && respBody.error.message)
                error = respBody.error.message;
            else
                error = 'Bad_Code';

            if (error.indexOf("does not exist or one of its queried") != -1 && error.indexOf("Resource") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("A User does not exist with the User ID provided");

            if (error.indexOf("Bad_Code") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Something went wrong");

        }

        return respObj;
    },


    isUserInGroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {

        this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);

        if (inputObj.status == 400)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");

        if (inputObj.status == 404)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");

        return respObj;
    },


    userErrorHandler: function(inputObj, respObj) {

        var respBody = new global.JSON().decode(inputObj['response']);

        respObj = this.commonUserErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj);

        if (inputObj.status == 400) {

            var msg;

            if (respBody.error && respBody.error.message) {
                msg = respBody.error.message;
            } else
                msg = 'Bad_Code';

            if (msg.indexOf("Unable to update the specified properties for on-premises mastered Directory Sync objects or objects currently undergoing migration.") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Updating Object which is created on-premises is not possible from Azure");

            if (msg.indexOf("Invalid value specified for property 'mailNickname'") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The value for 'Email Alias' is not valid.");

            if (msg.indexOf("Property userPrincipalName is invalid") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The value for User Login ID is not valid");

            if (msg.indexOf("Invalid format: Special characters not allowed") != -1 && respBody.error.details.target == 'Username')
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The value for User Login ID is not valid as it contains special characters");

            if (msg.indexOf("Another object with the same value for property userPrincipalName already exists") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("A user with the provided User login ID already exists");

            if (msg.indexOf("The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements");

            if (msg.indexOf("Property mailNickname value is required but is empty or missing") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Email Alias should not be empty");

            if (msg.indexOf("The domain portion of the userPrincipalName property is invalid. You must use one of the verified domain names in your organization") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The domain portion of the User Login ID is invalid. You must use one of the verified domain names in your organization");
			
			if (msg.indexOf("A value is required for property 'displayName' of resource 'User'") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Display Name should not be empty");
			
            if (msg.indexOf("Invalid value specified for property") != -1 && respBody.error.details[0].target == 'businessPhones')
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The specified value for Business Phones is invalid");


            if (msg.indexOf("Property preferredLanguage has an invalid value") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The preferred Language value is invalid. It follows ISO Standard 639-1");


            if (msg.indexOf("Property usageLocation is invalid") != -1 || msg.indexOf("Invalid value specified for property \'usageLocation\'") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The Usage Location value is invalid. It follows ISO standard 3166");


            if (msg.indexOf("Please fix the request before retrying") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
        }

        return respObj;

    },

    isUserAccountLockedHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler2(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        }

        return respObj;
    },
	
	lookPwdExpirationDetailsHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
		if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        } 
		if(!respObj.errorMessage) {
			respObj = this.genericErrorHandler2(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
		}
        return respObj;
    },


    resetPasswordHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler2(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = "Invalid User ID - " + inputObj.user_id;
            }
        } else if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements");
            }

        }

        return respObj;
    },

    retrieveAllGroupsforUserIdHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {

        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var regexp = new RegExp(/Resource '.*' does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present/);

                if (regexp.test(responseBody.error.message))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid User ID");
            }
        }
        return respObj;
    },

    handleOauthTokenResponse: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj.errormessage = responseBody.error_description ? responseBody.error_description : "Unknown Error";
        if (inputObj.status == 401) {
            respObj.errormessage = 'Unauthorized';
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error == 'invalid_client')
                respObj.errormessage = 'Invalid Client Secret is provided.';
        } else if (inputObj.status == 403) {
            respObj.errormessage = 'Forbidden request.';
        } else if (inputObj.status == 500) {
            respObj.errormessage = 'Azure not reachable.';
        } else if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error_description) {
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown error");
                if (responseBody.error_description.indexOf('Check to make sure you have the correct tenant ID') != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. Check Client ID.';
                else if (responseBody.error == 'invalid_scope')
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. Check OAuth Scope of the user.';
                else if (responseBody.error_description.indexOf('The user account {EmailHidden} does not exist') != -1 ||
                    responseBody.error_description.indexOf('To sign into this application, the account must be added to the directory') != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. Check if user exists in the directory.';
                else if (responseBody.error_description.indexOf('Error validating credentials due to invalid username or password') != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. Check Client ID and Credentials.';
                else if (responseBody.error_description.indexOf('The account is locked, you\'ve tried to sign in too many times with an incorrect user ID or password') != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. User account is locked, try after sometime.';
                else if (responseBody.error_description.indexOf('The user account is disabled') != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. User account is blocked, unlock it to change your password.';
            }
        }
        return respObj;
    },

    handleChangePasswordResponse: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj.errormessage = responseBody.error_description ? responseBody.error_description : "Unknown Error";
        if (inputObj.status == 401) {
            respObj.errormessage = 'Unauthorized';
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.code == "InvalidAuthenticationToken") {
                respObj.errormessage = 'Insufficient permissions. Check OAuth token and scope permission.';
            }
        } else if (inputObj.status == 403)
            respObj.errormessage = 'Forbidden request. Check OAuth token and scope permission.';
        else if (inputObj.status == 500)
            respObj.errormessage = 'Azure not reachable.';
        else if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                respObj.errormessage = 'Unknown error';
                if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Bad request. Specified password doesn't comply with password complexity requirements.");
                else if (responseBody.error.message.indexOf("Incorrect password. Password provided does not match the old password") != -1)
                    respObj.errormessage = 'Bad request. Incorrect old password.';
            }
        }
        return respObj;
    },
	
	addMultipleUsersToGroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        var msg = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : null;
        if (inputObj.status == 400 && msg) {
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the Member Already Exists in group");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties: 'owners'.") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the Provided user is already an owner of the Group");
            if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            for (var i = 0; i < inputObj.userIds.length; i++) {
                if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userIds[i].trim()) != -1)) {
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the User ID is Invalid");
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (msg.indexOf("of type 'Group' is invalid for the 'owners' reference") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the User ID is Invalid");
            if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'directoryObjects' refers to a collection") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the User ID is Invalid");
            if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'groups' refers to a collection") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the User is already added to the Group");
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 404 && msg) {
            if ((msg.indexOf("does not exist") != -1)) {
                for (var j = 0; j < inputObj.userIds.length; j++) {
                    if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.userIds[j].trim()) != -1) {
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Any of the User ID is Invalid");
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            }
        }
        if (respObj.errorMessage) {
            respObj.error_message = respObj.errorMessage;
            delete respObj.errorMessage;
        }
        return respObj;
    },
	
	updateOffice365GroupHandler: function(inputObj, respObj, responseBody) {
		respObj = this.addMultipleUsersToGroupHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
		var msg = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : null;
		if (inputObj.status == 400 && msg) {
			if (msg && msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties: 'owners'") != -1)
                respObj.error_message = "Any of the user is already the owner of the Group";
		}
		if (inputObj.status == 404 && msg) {
            if ((msg.indexOf("does not exist") != -1)) {
                for (var j = 0; j < inputObj.ownerIds.length; j++) {
                    if ((inputObj.ownerIds[j].trim()) && msg.indexOf(inputObj.ownerIds[j].trim()) != -1) {
                        respObj.error_message = "Any of the Owner ID is Invalid";
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1)
                    respObj.error_message = "Invalid Group ID";
            }
        }
		return respObj;
	},
	
	addDeviceToGroupHandler: function(inputObj,responseBody) {
        var respObj = {};
		respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        var msg = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : null;
        if (inputObj.status == 400 && msg) {
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage =  gs.getMessage("Member Already Exists in group");
            if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                respObj.errorMessage =  gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
            if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.deviceId.trim()) != -1))
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
            if (msg.indexOf("One or more added object references already exist for the following modified properties") != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Device is already added to the Group");

            for (var val in inputObj) {
                if (inputObj.hasOwnProperty(val) && inputObj[val] != undefined) {
                    if (!inputObj.groupId.toString().trim().length)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                    else if (!inputObj.deviceId.toString().trim().length)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
                }
            }

        }
        if (inputObj.status == 404 && msg) {
            if ((msg.indexOf("does not exist") != -1))
                if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.deviceId.trim()) != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
            if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1)
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
        }
        throw new Error(respObj.errorMessage);
    },
	
	removeDeviceFromGroupHandler: function(inputObj, responseBody) {
		var respObj = {};
        respObj.errorMessage = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : "UnKnown Error";
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 404) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;
                var regexp = new RegExp(/Resource '([a-zA-Z0-9-]+)' does not exist or one of its queried reference-property objects are not present/);

                if (regexp.test(responseBody.error.message)) {
                    if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.toString().trim()) != -1)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Device does not exist in the group");
                    if (msg.indexOf(inputObj.deviceId.toString().trim()) != -1)
                        respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
                }

            }
        }
        if (inputObj.status == 405) {

            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                msg = responseBody.error.message;
                if (msg.indexOf("Uri is invalid for a DELETE operation") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");

            }
        }

        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                msg = responseBody.error.message;
                respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Unknown Error");
                if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                if ((msg.indexOf("Invalid object identifier") != -1) && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.deviceId.trim()) != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("Unsupported referenced-object resource identifier for link property") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. Since the segment 'groups' refers to a collection") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("The request URI is not valid. $ref cannot be applied to the segment") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID");
                if (msg.indexOf("Bad request. Please fix the request before retrying.") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID or Device ID.");
            }
        }
		throw new Error(respObj.errorMessage);
    },
	
	isDeviceInGroupHandler: function(inputObj, responseBody) {
		var respObj = {};
        respObj.errorMessage = responseBody.error ? responseBody.error.message : "UnKnown Error";
        respObj = this.genericErrorHandler(inputObj, respObj, responseBody);
        if (inputObj.status == 400) {
            if (responseBody.error && responseBody.error.message) {
                var msg = responseBody.error.message;
                if (msg.indexOf("The format of the specified identifier is invalid") != -1)
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID.");
                if (msg.indexOf("Invalid GUID") != -1 && (msg.indexOf(inputObj.groupId.trim()) != -1))
                    respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Group ID.");
                }
           }
        if (inputObj.status == 404)
            respObj.errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid Device ID.");
		throw new Error(respObj.errorMessage);

    },

    type: 'AzureADErrorHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-23 06:55:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>b0081af0477121107607dffe046d43ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureADErrorHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b0081af0477121107607dffe046d43ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 06:55:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
